response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a special introductory price of $750,000 for you. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. We believe this price not only reflects the true value of the product but also provides an opportunity for you to maximize its potential impact. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service to ensure your satisfaction. Please let us know your decision within the next 48 hours. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
